nodes.text: Tomorrowland was a location advertised on a Coruscant billboard holofeed.

During the Coruscant segment of Star Tours: The Adventures Continue, a video billboard can be seen advertising "Tomorrowland" in Aurebesh. Disneyland's Star Tours attraction is located in that park's Tomorrowland themed area, and is said to launch from the Tomorrowland Starport.
